rdf:Description.dc:subject: Biography and Autobiography -- Philosophers
History -- General
Philosophers
Rationalists
rdf:Description.dc:description: This biographical dictionary prepared in 1889 presents a list of more or less well-known freethinkers, atheists, or rationalists with a short biography and references to their works.
